newest.message:
== Breaking Changes ==
* EVEMon repository changed from Mercurial to Git. * EVEMon from now on will be compiled to target ANY CPU. This means that it will run as 64bit on 64bit OS and as 32bit on 32bit OS.
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed a bug when generating the data files. * Fixed a visual bug for unknown skill complete percentage.
== Misc ==
* Changed any window that was showing on top of all windows to modal. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better application.
